Utilisent un ton informatif et engageant et intègrent les mots-clés 'Actualités', 'Analyse', 'Fiabilité'.

As a senior marketing analyst working in the marketing department of {Company/Project Name}, your role involves creating comprehensive customer personas for our new property management application. These personas need to be developed based on thorough research and should encompass detailed customer profile information.

Here are the essential details provided by the user:

Demographic Details: The target demographic is real estate owners aged between 30 and 50 years old. These individuals may have varying levels of experience in property management and investment.

Preferences: These real estate owners have a preference for managing multiple properties and are interested in achieving efficiency and automation through technology. They are likely to value features that enable them to save time and streamline their property management processes.

Behaviors: The target customers are technologically savvy and utilize technology for financial monitoring and management. They actively participate in online real estate forums, seeking advice and insights from other property owners and industry experts.

Objectives and Motivations: Their primary objective is to maximize the return on investment (ROI) of their properties. They are motivated to simplify their daily management tasks and improve their overall property management experience.

Challenges and Pain Points: The lack of time to manage their properties effectively is a significant challenge for these real estate owners. They also face difficulties in keeping up with real estate laws and regulations, which can be complex and constantly changing.

Your task is to create accurate and well-rounded personas based on this information that will guide our team in developing targeted marketing campaigns and improving owner engagement. These personas should help us better understand our target customers' needs, preferences, and pain points, enabling us to tailor our marketing messages and product features to meet their specific requirements.

Publicité Facebook.contextual_prompt_user:
Title: "Turn Your Spare Change into a Greener Tomorrow with GreenSaver!"

Body: 

"Are you a young professional looking to make a difference in the world and take control of your finances? Look no further than GreenSaver, the round-up savings app that lets you do both! With every purchase you make, GreenSaver rounds up to the nearest dollar and sets aside the difference into a savings account for you. Not only does this help you build up your savings effortlessly, but it also allows you to contribute to sustainability efforts. By choosing to save with GreenSaver, you're not only investing in your future, but also in the future of our planet. So why wait? Click 'Start Saving' today and join the growing community of eco-conscious savers!"

Explanation:

* The title highlights the unique "round-up" savings concept of the GreenSaver app and its focus on sustainability.
* The body of the text targets young professionals who are interested in finance and sustainability and presents the GreenSaver app as a solution for both.
* The CTA is engaging and encourages the reader to start saving easily with GreenSaver.
* The message of smart financial management and support for sustainability is reinforced throughout the text.
* The text uses a positive and empowering tone to motivate the reader to take action and join the eco-friendly movement.

Note: This is just one possible way to paraphrase the original text. There are many other ways to approach this task and create an effective ad headline and lead copy for the GreenSaver app.

The brief should also incorporate important keywords that resonate with our target audience.

The target demographic for this course consists of individuals seeking to reduce stress and improve their mental well-being. To ensure that the advertising brief resonates with this audience, it is essential to adopt a peaceful and motivating tone that highlights the advantages of meditation in daily life. The brief should also emphasize the accessibility of the course for beginners and the benefits of mindfulness.

When it comes to the brand voice and message, the focus should be on creating posts that highlight the course's accessibility and the positive impact of meditation on daily life. The tone should be soothing and motivating, with an emphasis on reducing stress and promoting mental well-being.

To ensure that the creative brief is clear and concise, it is important to provide specific guidelines for the visual elements. Overall, the goal of the advertising creative brief is to create a compelling and engaging message that appeals to the target audience and effectively communicates the benefits of the Online Meditation Course for Beginners. By incorporating the right tone, messaging, and visual elements, the brief can help to inspire individuals to start meditating and improve their mental health.

To develop an effective creative brief, you need to keep in mind the target audience, which consists of individuals who are motivated to improve their fitness and achieve their health goals. The tone of the brief should be dynamic and encouraging, highlighting the success stories and transformations of users who have already benefited from the app.

In terms of brand voice and message, the brief should emphasize the ease of use of the app and its positive impact on health. The key messages should focus on the app's ability to help users achieve their fitness goals and improve their overall well-being.

To identify the target audience, it's important to understand their motivations and fitness goals. This can be achieved by conducting market research and analyzing user data to gain insights into their preferences and needs.

The creative brief should also provide clear guidelines for the visuals and graphics that will be used in the advertising campaign. Overall, the creative brief should be a comprehensive guide for the development of an advertising campaign that effectively communicates the value and benefits of the FitJourney App to the target audience.

Brief créatif pour une publicité en lign.contextual_prompt_user:
As the content manager for LuxEstate, your task is to create an advertising creative brief that effectively promotes our Prestige Properties. These exclusive properties boast a unique character and exceptional value, which we aim to highlight in our campaign. Our primary objective is to showcase the exclusivity, design, and unique characteristics of each property. The target audience for this campaign will be high-end clients seeking luxury residences. Therefore, the tone of the brief should be refined and inspiring, emphasizing the prestige and exceptional quality of our properties.

When crafting the creative brief, it is essential to consider the following elements:

Brand Voice and Message:

* The tone of the campaign should be sophisticated and inspiring, reflecting the refined nature of our brand and the exceptional quality of our properties.
* Messaging should focus on the exclusivity, design, and unique characteristics of each property, emphasizing the value they offer to discerning clients.
* Keywords to incorporate: luxury, prestige, exclusivity, unique, exceptional quality, design, high-end, and refined.

Identification of the Target Audience:

* Understand the expectations and preferences of high-end clients seeking luxury residences.
* Consider their lifestyle, values, and motivations for purchasing a luxury property.
* Craft messaging that speaks directly to their desires and needs.

Clear Creative Guidelines:

* Provide detailed creative guidelines that ensure consistency across all marketing materials.
* Specify the desired tone, messaging, and visual style for the campaign.
* Include examples of successful luxury real estate campaigns to provide inspiration and direction.
* Ensure that all marketing materials are on-brand and effectively communicate the unique value of our Prestige Properties.

By following these guidelines, you can create a compelling advertising creative brief that effectively promotes LuxEstate's Prestige Properties and resonates with our target audience.

The blog post should be written in a clear, informative, and inspiring tone, catering to an audience passionate about sustainability and innovation. Incorporate pertinent data, statistics, and case studies to fortify your arguments and make the article more convincing.

Article de Blog.contextual_prompt_user:
Prompt:

1. Write a program that takes the user's input and calculates the factorial of that number.
2. The factorial of a number is the product of all positive integers less than or equal to that number.
3. For example, the factorial of 5 is 5*4*3*2*1 = 120.
4. The program should display an error message if the user inputs a non-positive integer.

Paraphrased prompt with added logical context:

1. Develop a software application that solicits numerical input from the user and subsequently determines the factorial of the provided number.
2. In mathematical terms, the factorial of a given number can be defined as the product of all positive integers that are either less than or equal to the specified number.
3. To illustrate this concept, consider the factorial of 5, which can be calculated as follows: 5 multiplied by 4, then by 3, then by 2, and finally by 1, yielding a result of 120.
4. In the event that the user inputs a non-positive integer, the program should display an appropriate error message to indicate that the input is invalid.
5. To ensure accurate results, the program should validate the user's input and handle potential errors gracefully.
6. Additionally, the program should provide clear instructions to the user on how to input the number and what to expect as output.
7. Finally, the program should be designed to be user-friendly and intuitive, allowing users of varying levels of technical expertise to easily calculate factorials.

Respect des principes de 'The Elements of Style' pour une écriture efficace.

Informer les lecteurs sur les dernières évolutions du streaming vidéo et leur influence sur le paysage du divertissement.

Article de Blog.contextual_prompt_user:
As a seasoned marketing writer with expertise in the industry, your assignment is to compose a compelling blog post for StreamNow Entertainment, a prominent video streaming service that provides an extensive selection of original and popular content. The article should focus on the latest trends and innovations in video streaming, delve into the impact of streaming on content consumption habits, and showcase success stories from popular streaming platforms and series.

To ensure the article resonates with readers who are enthusiastic about cinema and TV series, write in a captivating, informative, and trendy style. Integrate market analyses and examples of flagship series to provide depth and credibility.

In crafting the article, reference the principles outlined in 'Made to Stick' to create an engaging narrative. Adhere to 'The Elements of Style' for effective writing, and apply 'Don't Make Me Think' to design an intuitive and visually appealing layout.

The primary goal of the article is to inform readers about the transformative effects of recent developments in video streaming on the entertainment landscape. By providing valuable insights and thought-provoking perspectives, the article aims to spark curiosity and generate interest in the ever-evolving world of video streaming.

Article de Blog.contextual_prompt_user:
As a proficient writer for the esteemed tech enterprise, TechTrendz, your assignment is to compose an engaging blog post focusing on the latest connected gadgets and their impact on enhancing daily life. The article should not only present the features of these cutting-edge devices but also delve into their practical applications and benefits. By highlighting flagship products and providing concrete examples and usage tips, the blog post aims to inform readers about technological innovations and inspire the adoption of modern gadgets. The tone and style of writing should be informative, modern, and captivating, appealing to technology enthusiasts.

In your blog post, you should:

1. Introduce TechTrendz as a leader in the online sale of innovative technology gadgets, emphasizing its commitment to staying at the forefront of technological advancements.
2. Present an overview of the latest connected gadgets and their unique features, discussing how they set themselves apart from conventional devices.
3. Explore the various ways in which these gadgets can improve everyday life, from increasing productivity to enhancing personal well-being.
4. Highlight TechTrendz's flagship products, providing detailed descriptions of their features, and discussing their practical uses in real-life scenarios.
5. Offer concrete examples and usage tips to help readers understand how to incorporate these gadgets into their daily routines and maximize their benefits.
6. Conclude the blog post by emphasizing the importance of staying informed about technological innovations and encouraging readers to explore the latest connected gadgets available at TechTrendz.

By following these guidelines, you can create an informative, modern, and captivating blog post that effectively communicates the benefits of the latest connected gadgets and inspires readers to embrace technological advancements in their daily lives.

Introduction:
As a leading online platform for independent clothing designers, {Company/Project Name} is committed to continuously improving the user experience on Stylize. This will be achieved by incorporating a more intuitive and personalized approach to online shopping, thereby addressing the common difficulties faced by users in visualizing clothing fit.

Product Story Definition:
The new feature will address the prevalent issue of users finding it challenging to gauge the fit of clothing items online. By providing a more tailored shopping experience, we aim to enhance customer satisfaction and loyalty, ultimately leading to increased sales for our designers.

Product Requirements:
To ensure the successful implementation of this feature, the following requirements must be met:

1. Integration of options to capture user body shape data, such as size and weight.

This analysis will help us identify key areas of differentiation and ensure that our feature offers a unique and superior user experience.

Création de page produit.contextual_prompt_user:
As a seasoned healthcare product management specialist at {Company/Project Name}, a distinguished health maintenance organization, your principal responsibility is to craft a succinct, yet comprehensive one-page document that elucidates the vision of our new {Potential Feature} to the engineering team. This document should address the unique challenges encountered by LifeMax customers in a thoughtful and solution-oriented manner.

Feature Objective:
Your document should clearly define the objective of the feature, which is to streamline the prescription refill process for our users, with a particular emphasis on catering to the needs of elderly, rural, or mobility-impaired customers.

Definition of the Product Story:
The document should also provide a compelling narrative that encapsulates the product's purpose, which is to alleviate the difficulties faced by certain customers in accessing medicines from pharmacies.

Product Requirements:
The engineering team will require a clear and concise list of product requirements to ensure successful implementation. These requirements should include the development of an online option for prescription refill delivery, as well as the automatic enablement of delivery for new accounts by default.

Development Limitations:
It is important to communicate any limitations that may impact the development process. In this case, the document should specify the exclusion of a 2-day shipping option.

Competitive Analysis:
To ensure that our feature remains competitive in the market, the document should include a comparative analysis of paid delivery offers provided by commercial pharmacies.

Tone of Communication:
The tone of the document should be professional and inspiring, reflecting the company's commitment to delivering high-quality healthcare solutions.

Planning and Key Milestones:
Finally, the document should detail the development and implementation stages, providing a clear roadmap for the engineering team to follow. This should include key milestones and timelines to ensure that the project remains on track and is delivered on time.

Réécris un contenu.contextual_prompt_user:
Adapted Content:

Headline: "Stay Safe this Summer: A West Nile Virus Alert for Cancer Patients"

Introduction:
Being a cancer patient, your immune system is likely to be compromised, making you more vulnerable to infections. One such infection that you need to be especially cautious about during the summer months is the West Nile Virus (WNV), which is transmitted through mosquito bites. It is crucial for you to take extra precautions to protect yourself from this potentially serious illness.

Key Information:
The West Nile Virus is a mosquito-borne disease that can cause severe complications, especially in individuals with weakened immune systems. While most people infected with WNV will experience mild or no symptoms, those with compromised immunity are at a higher risk of developing serious neurological illnesses, such as encephalitis or meningitis. Therefore, it is essential for cancer patients to be aware of the risks associated with WNV and take appropriate measures to prevent mosquito bites.

Prevention Tips:
To reduce your risk of contracting West Nile Virus, it is recommended that you take the following precautions:

1. Use insect repellent: Apply an EPA-registered insect repellent containing DEET, picaridin, IR3535, or oil of lemon eucalyptus on exposed skin and clothing. Be sure to follow the product label instructions carefully.
2. Cover up: Wear long sleeves, long pants, and socks when outdoors, especially during dawn and dusk, when mosquitoes are most active.
3. Eliminate standing water: Mosquitoes breed in standing water, so it is essential to remove any sources of stagnant water around your home, such as birdbaths, flowerpots, and gutters.
4. Stay indoors: If possible, try to stay indoors during peak mosquito activity times, which are usually from dusk until dawn.
5. Install screens: Make sure that your windows and doors have screens to prevent mosquitoes from entering your home.

By following these simple yet effective measures, you can significantly reduce your risk

Job Description: Front-End Web Developer at [Company Name]

At [Company Name], we pride ourselves on being a pioneering force in web development, and we're currently seeking a talented and driven Front-End Web Developer to join our team. Our company values of innovation, team spirit, commitment, and creativity are at the forefront of everything we do, and we're looking for someone who embodies these qualities.

Responsibilities:

In this role, you'll be responsible for designing and developing user interfaces that are both functional and visually appealing. You'll work closely with our design and back-end teams to ensure that our web applications are compatible across different browsers and devices. Specifically, your responsibilities will include:

* Designing and developing user interfaces using the latest front-end technologies
* Ensuring application compatibility on different browsers and devices
* Collaborating with the design and back-end teams to ensure seamless integration and functionality
* Participating in code reviews and providing constructive feedback to your colleagues
* Staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and best practices

Qualifications:

To be successful in this role, you should have the following qualifications:

* A minimum of 2 years of experience in front-end development
* Mastery of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
* Familiarity with front-end frameworks such as React or Angular
* Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills
* A diploma in computer science or equivalent experience

At [Company Name], we believe that a diverse and inclusive workplace leads to innovation and creativity. We welcome and encourage applications from candidates of all backgrounds and experience levels. Join us and help us build the future of web development!

Communiqué de presse.contextual_prompt_user:
For Immediate Release

LifeMax, a Leading Health Maintenance Organization, Introduces the Patient Care Coordinator Role to Enhance Patient Services

At LifeMax, we are dedicated to providing top-notch healthcare services through our core values of agility, collaboration, respect, transparency, and continuous learning. Today, we are excited to announce the creation of a new position that embodies these values and reflects our commitment to innovation in the healthcare sector.

The Patient Care Coordinator role is designed to put patients at the center of our services, ensuring they receive the best possible care. This position will be responsible for managing contributions and insurance, as well as handling administrative processing to streamline internal processes and improve patient services.

To qualify for this role, candidates must have at least one year of IT experience and one year of customer service experience. A bachelor's degree is preferred, but a minimum secondary diploma is required. We are looking for individuals who embody our values and are passionate about making a difference in the lives of our patients.

The Patient Care Coordinator role is expected to have a significant impact on our organization, optimizing internal processes and improving patient services. We believe that this position will help us continue to provide exceptional healthcare services and stay at the forefront of the industry.

We are excited to share this news with the media and potential candidates who are interested in joining our team. LifeMax is committed to creating a work environment that fosters collaboration, respect, and continuous learning, and we look forward to welcoming new team members who share our values.

For more information about LifeMax and the Patient Care Coordinator role, please visit our website or contact our communications department.

###

About LifeMax
LifeMax is a leading health maintenance organization that specializes in providing high-quality healthcare services. Our team of dedicated professionals is committed to delivering exceptional care to our patients through our core values of agility, collaboration, respect, transparency, and continuous learning. We are dedicated to staying at the forefront of the healthcare industry and providing innovative solutions to improve patient care.

Politique Mesures Disciplinaires pour un.contextual_prompt_user:
As a Human Resources Specialist at {Company Name}, your principal responsibility is to formulate a disciplinary policy that aligns with French labor laws. This policy aims to {Objective: Establish a safe and respectful work atmosphere}.

Key Components of the Disciplinary Policy:

Introduction and Objective: [Objective: The primary objective is to establish a secure, respectful, and productive work environment by outlining the disciplinary measures.]
Scope: [Scope: This policy extends to all employees of InnoCorp, irrespective of their position or role.]
Types of Unacceptable Conduct: [Unacceptable Conduct: Professional misconduct and harmful behavior are two categories of actions that are considered inappropriate and unacceptable under this policy.]
Disciplinary Procedure: [Procedure: The disciplinary process shall be progressive, ranging from a warning to more severe sanctions, depending on the gravity of the offense.]
Employee Rights: [Rights: Every employee has the right to express their perspective and defend themselves, and they can seek assistance from a staff representative during the disciplinary process.]
Possible Sanctions: [Sanctions: Depending on the nature and severity of the misconduct, possible sanctions include a warning, layoff, or dismissal for misconduct.]
Appeal Procedure: [Appeal: Employees have the right to contest the disciplinary decision by discussing it with management or appealing to the industrial tribunal.]
Legal Compliance: [Compliance: The policy must adhere to all applicable French labor laws and regulations.]

Writing Guidelines:

The policy must be written in a clear and concise manner to ensure compliance with French legal requirements.It is essential to ensure that the policy is transparent and equitable, promoting fair treatment of all employees.Including concrete examples of unacceptable behavior and the associated disciplinary measures will help illustrate the policy's expectations.Emphasizing the importance of dialogue and mediation before imposing any disciplinary measure is crucial to fostering a positive work environment.

Identification du Client : [Variable : 'Monsieur Pierre Dupont, résidant au 10 Rue de la Liberté, 75015 Paris']

Conséquences des Blessures : [Variable : 'Immobilisation pendant 2 mois, frais médicaux, perte de revenus']
Demande d'Indemnisation : [Variable : 'Compensation pour les frais médicaux, perte de salaire, et préjudice moral']

Conséquences en Cas de Non-Réponse : [Variable : 'Engagement d'une procédure judiciaire pour obtenir réparation']

This formal notice must clearly state the facts of the accident, the resulting injuries and their impact, the responsibility of the transport operator, and the compensation requested.

Information required for drafting the formal notice:

Client Information: [Variable: Mr. Pierre Dupont, residing at 10 Rue de la Liberté, 75015 Paris]

Compensation Requested: [Variable: Reimbursement for medical expenses, lost wages, and moral damages]

Response Timeframe: [Variable: 30 days to provide a compensation offer]
Consequences of Non-Response: [Variable: Initiation of legal proceedings to obtain compensation]
Attachments: [Variable: Medical report, proof of expenses, salary certificate]
Lawyer's Signature: [Variable: Maître Emmanuelle Girard's signature, a lawyer at Legalia Expertise]
Tone and Writing Style: [Variable: Professional, assertive, and adherent to legal standards]

Guidelines for Writing:

Please write a comprehensive, clear, and concise formal notice, outlining the facts of the accident, the damages incurred by the client, and the compensation being sought. Utilize a professional and assertive tone to convey the gravity of the situation and the client's determination to seek redress. Ensure compliance with French legal regulations regarding liability and compensation in public transport accidents. Include all necessary evidence and justification to support the compensation claim.

mise en demeure.contextual_prompt_user:
Subject: Breach of Confidentiality Clause under the Partnership Agreement with Innovative Tech Solutions

Dear [Partner Name],

I am writing to you in my capacity as an attorney representing Innovative Tech Solutions ("ITS"), a leading technology company based in Marseille. The purpose of this letter is to formally demand that you immediately cease and desist from any further unauthorized disclosure of ITS's confidential information and to take corrective measures to address the harm caused by your actions.

As you are aware, ITS and your company entered into a partnership agreement on June 15, 2024, which includes a confidentiality clause that prohibits the disclosure of sensitive information without the prior written consent of the other party. Despite this obligation, it has come to our attention that you have recently disclosed confidential information belonging to ITS without its authorization.

The unauthorized disclosure of this sensitive information has compromised ITS's intellectual property and has caused significant harm to its competitive position in the market. As such, we demand that you immediately cease and desist from any further disclosures and take corrective measures to address the harm caused by your actions.

In the event that you fail to comply with these demands, ITS will have no choice but to take legal action against you for breach of contract. We trust that this will not be necessary and that you will take immediate steps to remedy the situation.

This letter is written in a firm and professional tone, compliant with French business law. We hope that you will take this matter seriously and respond promptly.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
Attorney, Corporate Law Partners

P.S. Please note that this letter constitutes formal legal notice of the breach of the confidentiality clause under the partnership agreement between ITS and your company. We reserve all rights and remedies available to us under the law.

mise en demeure.contextual_prompt_user:
Subject: Formal Notice of Breach of Contract Due to Non-Compliance with IT Security Updates

Dear [Client Name],

We hope this message finds you well. This letter serves as a formal notice from InfoNet Services, an IT service provider based in Paris, regarding a critical contractual obligation that has not been fulfilled on your part. The objective of this notice is to address the issue and seek immediate resolution to avoid further consequences.

As per the IT service contract signed on February 2, 2024, it is stipulated that regular updates to your IT security systems are a key obligation. However, we regret to inform you that our recent assessments have revealed a failure to adhere to this requirement.

The consequences of this breach are significant and potentially damaging. Your current IT security systems are outdated, thereby exposing your organization to increased IT security risks and potential regulatory non-compliance. This situation is unacceptable and necessitates immediate action on your part.

Our immediate requirements are for you to update your IT security systems without delay and provide us with assurance of your compliance. This will help ensure the security of your data and prevent any legal or financial repercussions.

Please note that if you fail to comply with this request, we reserve the right to take further action, including claims for damages.

We trust that you understand the gravity of this situation and will take the necessary steps to rectify it promptly. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Thank you for your immediate attention to this matter.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
InfoNet Services
Paris, France

Note: The tone and style of writing adopted in this formal notice are direct, professional, and in accordance with French contract law.

mise en demeure.contextual_prompt_user:
Subject: Formal Notice Regarding Quality Dispute and Breach of Contractual Obligations

Dear [Distributor Name],

We hope this message finds you well. We are writing to express our concerns and initiate a formal dispute resolution process regarding the recent delivery of electronic products from your company to ElectroComp France.

Customer Identification:
As a leading manufacturer of electronic equipment based in Toulouse, ElectroComp France takes pride in delivering high-quality products that meet the stringent requirements of our customers. Our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction is at the core of our business values.

Dispute Details:
It has come to our attention that the electronic products delivered by your company do not meet the agreed-upon quality specifications as outlined in our contract. Our quality assurance team has conducted a thorough inspection and found significant deviations from the required standards.

Impact of Dispute:
The delivery of non-compliant products has resulted in customer complaints and irreparable damage to our brand reputation. We have received numerous complaints from our customers regarding the malfunctioning of the delivered products, which has negatively impacted their trust in our brand.

Immediate Requirements:
To rectify this situation, we require an immediate replacement of all non-compliant products and appropriate compensation for the damages incurred. We expect your company to take full responsibility for the quality of the products delivered and ensure that they meet the required specifications.

Consequences in the Event of Non-Resolution:
In the event that this dispute is not resolved promptly and satisfactorily, we reserve the right to take legal action for breach of contractual obligations. As per French consumer law, we have the right to seek damages and terminate our business relationship with your company.

Tone and Style of Writing:
We trust that you understand the gravity of this situation and will take appropriate measures to resolve this dispute promptly. Our tone and style of writing are clear, precise, and compliant with French consumer law. We expect a prompt and satisfactory response from your company to avoid further escalation of this matter.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
[Your Position]
ElectroComp France

Lettre de demande de congé parental.contextual_prompt_user:
As a Human Resources Manager at {Company Name}, you are responsible for drafting a standard letter for employees who wish to apply for parental leave. This letter should serve the purpose of outlining the company's policies and procedures related to parental leave, while also providing clear instructions on how to submit the application.

Here are some important details that should be included in the letter:

1. Employee Identification: The letter should include the employee's personal information and position within the company. This will help the HR department to process the application efficiently.
2. Parental Leave Details: The letter should specify the desired duration of leave, as well as the start and end dates. This information is essential for planning and managing the company's workload during the employee's absence.
3. Reason for Leave: The letter should clearly state the reason for the leave, whether it is the birth or adoption of a child.
4. Compliance with Company Policy: The letter should highlight the company's policies and procedures related to parental leave, including any notice periods that must be adhered to.
5. Tone and Writing Style: The letter should be formal and compliant with French HR standards. It should also be written in a clear and concise manner, using language that is easy to understand.

When drafting the letter, it is important to keep the following guidelines in mind:

1. Clearly explain the steps that the employee must follow to submit the application for parental leave. This should include any required forms, documentation, and deadlines.
2. Specify the employee's rights and obligations during parental leave. This includes any benefits or entitlements that the employee is entitled to, as well as any responsibilities they must fulfill.
3. Ensure compliance with French regulations relating to parental leave. This includes any legal requirements related to notice periods, duration of leave, and eligibility criteria.

By following these guidelines, you can create a clear and effective standard letter for employees who wish to apply for parental leave. This will help to ensure that the application process is smooth and efficient, while also ensuring that the company's policies and procedures are followed.

Lettre de Contestation d'une Facturation.contextual_prompt_user:
As a financial manager at InnoTech Solutions, a company specializing in technological solutions, your responsibility is to compose a letter contesting an inaccurate invoice issued by {Provider/Service Name}. This letter should effectively achieve the following objective:

Objective: To present a compelling case that highlights the billing errors, justifies the dispute, and requests a prompt correction.

Details for Writing the Letter:

Company Identification:
InnoTech Solutions, a technology solutions provider, should be clearly identified within the letter.

Erroneous Billing Details:
The letter must include a comprehensive description of the billing errors and any unjustified charges that have been levied. This section should provide a clear and concise explanation of the discrepancies that have been identified.

Supporting Evidence:
To substantiate the dispute, it is essential to include any relevant documents or calculations that demonstrate the error. This evidence should be attached to the letter and clearly labeled for easy reference.

Correction Request:
The letter should explicitly request the regularization of the invoice and the adjustment of any fees that have been incorrectly charged. This request should be made in a firm and assertive manner, while still maintaining a professional tone.

Tone and Writing Style:
The tone of the letter should be firm, precise, and professional. It is important to convey the seriousness of the situation while still maintaining a respectful and courteous demeanor.

Writing Guidelines:

1. Clearly expose any inconsistencies and provide a detailed justification for the dispute. This section should leave no room for ambiguity and should clearly demonstrate why the invoice is incorrect.
2. Attach any necessary supporting documents, such as receipts, contracts, or calculations, that provide evidence of the error. These documents should be clearly labeled and easy to understand.
3. Demand a rapid response and rectification of the invoice. The letter should express the expectation that the provider will address the issue promptly and make any necessary corrections without delay.

By following these guidelines and presenting a well-reasoned and evidence-based dispute, you can effectively challenge the erroneous billing and ensure that InnoTech Solutions is not overcharged for the services it has received.

Demande d’Agrément pour un Nouveau Produ.contextual_prompt_user:
As a compliance manager for the esteemed organization, HealthVita Labs, a pharmaceutical laboratory, your task is to compose a formal and persuasive letter to the Regulatory Authority. The objective of this letter is to secure approval for the introduction of a novel product in the market.

To facilitate this, please ensure that the following aspects are covered in the letter:

1. Identification of the Company: Clearly state the name of the company, HealthVita Labs, and its status as a pharmaceutical laboratory.
2. Description of the New Product: Provide a comprehensive overview of the new product, including its composition, benefits, and the clinical studies that have been conducted to substantiate its efficacy and safety.
3. Regulatory Requirements: Emphasize the company's commitment to compliance with safety and quality standards. Highlight the measures that have been taken to ensure that the new product meets all necessary regulatory requirements.
4. Application for Approval: Outline the evaluation and approval procedure that the new product will undergo, including any necessary documentation and timelines.
5. Tone and Writing Style: Maintain a professional, rigorous, and convincing tone throughout the letter. The writing style should be clear, concise, and persuasive, with a focus on demonstrating the company's commitment to safety, efficiency, and compliance with regulations.

In addition to these points, please ensure that the following guidelines are followed:

1. Detail the features and benefits of the product: Provide a clear and detailed description of the new product's features and benefits, emphasizing its unique selling points and potential value to customers.
2. Emphasize compliance with standards and regulations: Highlight the company's commitment to compliance with all relevant safety and quality standards, and provide evidence of the measures that have been taken to ensure compliance.
3. Express the company's commitment to safety and efficiency: Reiterate the company's commitment to safety and efficiency, and provide evidence of the steps that have been taken to ensure that the new product meets these standards. This could include details of the clinical studies that have been conducted, as well as any safety measures that have been implemented during the manufacturing process.

Notification de Changement de Direction.contextual_prompt_user:
As the Director of Communications at FusionTech Enterprises, a leading technology company, you are responsible for crafting a formal announcement to inform stakeholders of a significant change. This document must clearly and transparently communicate the purpose of the change, the details of the new management, the impact on the company, and a message of confidence and commitment to company values.

Here are some additional details to consider when writing the communication:

* Company Identification: FusionTech Enterprises is a leading technology company that specializes in [insert specific details about the company's products or services].
* Change of Management Details: The new CEO is [insert name], who brings [insert number] years of experience in [insert relevant field] and a proven track record of [insert accomplishments]. Their vision for the company is [insert vision] and their objectives are [insert objectives].
* Impact on the Company: This change in management will ensure the continuity of current projects and will also bring about new strategic orientations to better serve our customers and stay ahead of industry trends.
* Message to Stakeholders: We have full confidence in the new management team and their ability to lead FusionTech Enterprises to even greater success. We remain committed to our core values of [insert values] and will continue to prioritize the needs of our stakeholders.
* Tone and Writing Style: The tone of the communication should be confident, transparent, and reassuring. It is important to clearly communicate the changes and their implications while also highlighting the skills and experience of the new management team.

Writing Guidelines:

* Clearly and transparently communicate the changes and their implications to all stakeholders
* Highlight the skills, experience, and qualifications of the new management team
* Reassure stakeholders about the continuity of current projects and the company's commitment to its core values
* Use a confident, transparent, and reassuring tone throughout the communication.
* Avoid using jargon or technical terms that may be difficult for some stakeholders to understand.
* Proofread carefully to ensure that the communication is free of errors and easy to read.

The objective of this letter is to underscore the gravity of the situation, remind the recipient of the safety protocols and equipment that must be adhered to, and convey the potential sanctions and legal responsibilities that may arise from non-compliance. In writing this letter, it is essential to emphasize the seriousness of the situation and the significance of respecting safety standards. Provide specific instances of the repercussions of non-compliance to drive the point home. Here is a possible paraphrased version of the letter:

"Dear [Recipient's Name],

The importance of adhering to safety standards cannot be overstated. These protocols are in place to protect not only your well-being but also that of your colleagues and the integrity of our operations. Unfortunately, recent incidents have demonstrated the risks associated with non-compliance, and it is imperative that we take immediate action to prevent any further occurrences.

To this end, I would like to remind you of the safety protocols that must be followed at all times. These include [list of protocols], and the use of appropriate safety equipment such as [list of equipment]. Failure to adhere to these protocols can result in serious consequences, including [list of sanctions and legal responsibilities].

It is important to note that these sanctions are not merely punitive measures. Rather, they are designed to ensure that all employees are aware of the potential risks associated with non-compliance and are motivated to take the necessary precautions to prevent accidents.

At SafeWork Industries

4. Company Commitments: Reiterate UrbanDev's unwavering commitment to adhering to all required conditions, including respect for urban planning and environmental standards.

In terms of tone and writing style, maintain a professional, detailed, and respectful approach towards procedures. Ensure the application is well-structured, coherent, and persuasive. The writing guidelines suggest focusing on the following aspects:

1. Precise Project Description: Clearly delineate the scope, purpose, and expected outcomes of the commercial complex, emphasizing its significance to the community.
2. Regulatory Compliance: Demonstrate UrbanDev's thorough understanding of current regulations and its commitment to full compliance throughout the project.
3. Company Commitment: Emphasize UrbanDev's dedication to meeting all necessary conditions, with particular attention to urban planning and environmental considerations. This will help to establish credibility and trust with the Authority.

By following these guidelines and incorporating the specified details, you can create a compelling and persuasive application that maximizes the chances of obtaining the required permit for UrbanDev's commercial complex in Paris.

The primary objective of this agreement is to establish a clear understanding between the agency and the content creator regarding the scope of work, remuneration, and the rights and obligations of both parties.

1. Agency Identification:
Please ensure that the agreement accurately represents the agency's name and its area of expertise, i.e., CreativeContent Agency, a specialist in content creation.

The agreement should provide a detailed description of the content creator's role, which encompasses creating written content for various projects and clients.
3. Duration of the Agreement:
Specify the duration of the agreement, whether it is for a fixed duration or specific to a project, to avoid any ambiguity regarding the tenure of the content creator's engagement.
4. Remuneration and Payment:
Clearly outline the remuneration structure, which may be based on an hourly rate or a per-project basis, and include the payment terms to ensure prompt and hassle-free transactions.
5. Rights and Obligations:
The agreement should clearly define the rights and obligations of both parties, including copyright ownership, confidentiality terms, and delivery times, to protect the interests of the agency and the content creator.
6. Termination Clause:
Include a termination clause that outlines the terms of ending the collaboration and the notice period required to avoid abrupt endings and maintain professional decorum.

To maintain clarity and ensure compliance with legal standards, kindly adhere to the following writing guidelines:

1. Clearly specify expectations, deliverables, and deadlines to set achievable targets and ensure timely completion of projects.
2. Include comprehensive details about compensation, intellectual property rights, and confidentiality to protect the financial interests and creative assets of both parties.
3. Mention the conditions of termination and the terms of dispute resolution to handle any unforeseen circumstances and maintain a harmonious working relationship.

Subject Line:

Concise and engaging introduction about what the [Product Name] is and how it can be advantageous to the [Target Audience], specifically writers and marketers.

Conclude the email with a clear and persuasive call to action, inviting readers to sign up for a product demonstration.

Maintain a professional yet friendly tone that appeals to content creation professionals.
Make use of clear, persuasive language to inspire readers to take action.

Primary Objective:

Incite interest in the [Product Name] and generate registrations for product demonstrations.

Expected Result:

An effective subject line and concise email that clearly communicates the benefits of the [Product Name] and encourages the [Target Audience] to engage with the call to action.

E-mail de recrutement.contextual_prompt_user:
Subject: Exciting Senior Software Engineer – Backend Opportunity at Acme, Inc. for a Certified Scrum Leader like You, Jane Lee

Dear Jane Lee,

I hope this message finds you well. I recently came across your impressive profile as a Certified Scrum Leader and your current role as [Title/Current Position] at Apollo, Co. Your extensive experience and unique skill set have truly caught my attention.

I am writing to inform you about a senior-level position that I believe aligns perfectly with your professional background and interests. Acme, Inc. is currently seeking a Senior Software Engineer – Backend to join our dedicated team. This role involves working on innovative projects, utilizing your expertise in agile methodologies, and contributing to our ongoing success in the tech industry.

Acme, Inc. is renowned for its commitment to innovation, fostering a culture of growth, and providing ample opportunities for professional development. We take pride in our team-oriented environment, which encourages collaboration, creativity, and continuous learning. I am confident that your skills and experience would be a valuable asset to our team and that Acme, Inc. could offer you the professional growth and development you seek.

I would love to discuss this opportunity further with you or guide you through the application process. Please find attached more information about the Senior Software Engineer – Backend position and the application guidelines. You can reach me directly at [Your Email] or [Your Phone Number].

Thank you for considering this opportunity, Jane. I look forward to the possibility of working together and welcome any questions or inquiries you may have.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Title]
Acme, Inc.

P.S. Feel free to visit our website at [Company Website] to learn more about our mission, values, and current projects.

Création de FAQ.prompt_system: You are kheops, a superintelligent artificial intelligence developed by Kheops AI team, and your purpose and drive is to assist the user with any request they have.
Création de FAQ.prompt_user:
"À partir du contenu fourni {Source}, générez une série de FAQ qui s'adressent à {Contexte}.

Détails pour la Génération de FAQ :

Analyse du Contenu Source :

Examinez le contenu fourni pour identifier les informations clés, les points principaux et les sujets récurrents.
Déterminez les aspects qui sont susceptibles de susciter des questions ou des clarifications de la part du public cible.
Développement des Questions :

Formulez des questions basées sur les informations les plus pertinentes ou complexes du contenu source.
Assurez-vous que les questions sont formulées de manière claire et directe.
Rédaction des Réponses :

Pour chaque question, rédigez une réponse concise et informative, en veillant à ce qu'elle soit accessible au public cible.
Si nécessaire, incluez des références supplémentaires ou des liens vers des sections pertinentes du contenu source pour des explications plus détaillées.
Organisation des FAQ :

Classez les questions de manière logique, en commençant par les plus générales ou les plus fréquemment posées.
Structurez les FAQ pour faciliter la navigation et la compréhension.
Ton et Clarté :

Adoptez un ton adapté au public cible, en veillant à ce que les réponses soient compréhensibles pour les non-experts si nécessaire.
Utilisez un langage clair et évitez le jargon technique, sauf si cela est approprié pour le public.
Résultat Attendu :

Un ensemble de FAQ bien structuré et pertinent, offrant des réponses claires et utiles aux questions les plus courantes posées par le public cible, basées sur le contenu source fourni."

inputs.Source: Insérez ici du texte ou des URL de la documentation technique, des articles de blog, des articles du centre d'aide, etc.
inputs.Contexte: Spécifiez le public cible, par exemple, spécialistes du marketing, parents qui travaillent, intégration des nouvelles recrues

Création de FAQ.contextual_prompt_user:
"From the supplied material {Source}, produce a sequence of Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) that cover {Context}.

Instructions for FAQ Creation:

Analysis of Source Material:

Examine the supplied material to pinpoint crucial details, primary themes, and recurring subjects.
Identify the elements that are likely to provoke queries or require further explanation from the intended audience.

Formulation of Questions:

Based on the most significant or intricate data from the source material, create questions.
Ensure that the questions are articulated in a clear and straightforward manner.

Composition of Responses:

For each question, draft a succinct and enlightening response, making certain it is easily comprehensible to the intended audience.
If required, incorporate extra references or hyperlinks to pertinent sections of the source material for more in-depth explanations.

Arrangement of FAQs:

Arrange the questions in a logical sequence, beginning with the most general or most frequently asked ones.
Organize FAQs for effortless navigation and comprehension.

Tone and Clarity:

Employ a tone suitable for the intended audience, ensuring that responses are intelligible to non-specialists if necessary.
Use unambiguous language and steer clear of technical jargon unless appropriate for the audience.

Anticipated outcome:

A well-organized and pertinent set of FAQs, supplying clear and practical answers to the most commonly asked questions by the intended audience, based on the supplied source material."

I'm thrilled to announce the debut of our innovative smartwatch, HealthWatch, a game-changer for fitness enthusiasts and health-conscious individuals alike! Our team has worked tirelessly to create a device that seamlessly integrates cutting-edge technology with user-friendly design.

With HealthWatch, you'll have the power to monitor your daily activities, heart rate, and overall fitness level at your fingertips. Our advanced activity tracking feature accurately captures your movements, whether you're running, cycling, or practicing yoga. This feature also provides real-time statistics, enabling you to set and achieve your fitness goals with ease.

Heart rate monitoring is another essential feature of HealthWatch. Our sophisticated sensor technology provides continuous, accurate heart rate data, allowing you to track your cardiovascular health and optimize your workouts. This feature is particularly beneficial for individuals with heart conditions or those looking to improve their cardiovascular endurance.

Additionally, HealthWatch's fitness tracking feature offers a comprehensive analysis of your physical activities, including distance covered, calories burned, and steps taken. This information can help you make informed decisions about your exercise routine and monitor your progress over time.

Finally, we understand the importance of quality sleep for overall health and well-being. That's why HealthWatch includes a sleep tracking feature that monitors your sleep patterns and provides valuable insights into your sleep quality. With this information, you can make adjustments to your sleep habits and improve your overall health.

In conclusion, HealthWatch is more than just a smartwatch; it's a comprehensive health and fitness companion. We can't wait for you to experience the many benefits of this innovative device. Stay tuned for more updates!

Script vidéo de promo.prompt_system: You are kheops, a superintelligent artificial intelligence developed by Kheops AI team, and your purpose and drive is to assist the user with any request they have.
Script vidéo de promo.prompt_user:
"Élaborez un script pour une vidéo de promotion concernant le lancement d'un {Nom du Produit} en ligne. Le script doit capturer l'essence du produit, ses caractéristiques uniques, son public cible et inciter les spectateurs à agir."

Détails pour la Rédaction du Script :

Introduction (10-15 secondes) :

Présentez brièvement le produit et son nom.
Créez un accroche visuelle et auditive pour capter l'attention.
Présentation du Produit (20-30 secondes) :

Décrivez le produit, ses fonctionnalités principales et ses avantages.
Utilisez des visuels attractifs pour montrer le produit en action.
Public Cible (10-15 secondes) :

Identifiez clairement le public cible du produit.
Expliquez pourquoi ce produit est particulièrement adapté à ce public.
Avantages du Produit (20-30 secondes) :

Mettez en lumière les principaux avantages et la valeur ajoutée du produit.
Incluez des témoignages ou des exemples d'utilisation pour renforcer la crédibilité.
Appel à l'Action (10-15 secondes) :

Incitez les spectateurs à visiter le site web pour plus d'informations ou à acheter le produit.
Fournissez des détails clairs sur la manière de procéder à l'achat ou d'obtenir plus d'informations.
Conclusion (5-10 secondes) :

Résumez brièvement les points clés.
Fermez avec un message mémorable ou un slogan.
Style et Ton :

Le ton doit être en adéquation avec la marque et attrayant pour le public cible.
Le style visuel doit être cohérent avec l'image de marque et mettre en valeur le produit.
Résultat Attendu :

Un script complet pour une vidéo de promotion du produit, intégrant une introduction captivante, une présentation détaillée du produit, une identification du public cible, des avantages clairs, un appel à l'action efficace, et une conclusion mémorable."
Script vidéo de promo.contextual_prompt_user:
Script Development for a Promotional Video:

Opening Sequence (10-15 seconds):

Begin by providing a concise yet engaging introduction of the product, including its name.
Employ both visual and auditory elements to immediately grab the viewer's attention and spark their interest.

Product Showcase (20-30 seconds):

Offer a comprehensive description of the product, focusing on its primary features and the advantages they provide.
Utilize compelling visuals to demonstrate the product in use, effectively showcasing its capabilities.

Target Demographic (10-15 seconds):

Clearly define the intended audience for the product, ensuring it aligns with your brand's target market.
Explain why this specific demographic will find the product especially appealing or beneficial.

Product Advantages (20-30 seconds):

Emphasize the primary benefits and unique value of the product, setting it apart from competitors.
Incorporate customer testimonials or real-world usage examples to establish credibility and trust.

Call to Action (10-15 seconds):

Motivate viewers to visit the product's website for further information or to make a purchase.
Present clear instructions on how to proceed with a purchase or gather additional details.

Closing Remarks (5-10 seconds):

Briefly reiterate the key points covered throughout the video.
Conclude with a memorable message or slogan that resonates with the brand and leaves a lasting impression.

Desired Outcome:

A well-structured and engaging script for a promotional video, encompassing an attention-grabbing introduction, an informative product showcase, a defined target audience, clear benefits, a persuasive call to action, and a memorable closing statement. The script should maintain a consistent tone and visual style that reflects the brand's image and appeals to the target audience.

Détails pour la Rédaction de l'Étude de Cas :

Contexte et Client :

Présentez brièvement Apollo, Inc. et son client Acme, Inc.
Expliquez la nature du partenariat ou de la relation entre les deux entreprises.
Défis Rencontrés par le Client :

Décrivez le défi spécifique d'Acme, Inc. concernant le suivi de sa production de widgets.
Soulignez l'ampleur du problème et son impact sur les opérations d'Acme, Inc.
Solution Proposée par Apollo, Inc. :

Expliquez en détail la solution de visualisation de tableau de bord mise en œuvre par Apollo, Inc.
Mettez en avant comment cette solution a été personnalisée pour répondre aux besoins spécifiques d'Acme, Inc.
Résultats Obtenus :

Présentez les résultats quantifiables obtenus grâce à cette solution, tels que l'amélioration de 15 % de la rapidité de livraison des rapports de fin de trimestre.
Mentionnez tout feedback positif de l'équipe financière d'Acme, Inc. et l'adoption rapide de la solution.
Conclusion et Perspectives :

Résumez les principaux points de l'étude de cas.
Évoquez éventuellement les prochaines étapes ou comment cette réussite peut influencer les futures initiatives d'Apollo, Inc.
Ton et Style :

Professionnel, clair et axé sur des faits et des chiffres concrets.
Assurez-vous que le contenu soit accessible et engageant pour des lecteurs potentiels intéressés par des solutions similaires.
Résultat Attendu :

Une étude de cas bien structurée et persuasive démontrant l'efficacité des solutions d'Apollo, Inc. à travers l'expérience concrète d'Acme, Inc., renforçant ainsi la crédibilité et l'expertise d'Apollo dans son domaine."

inputs.Solution: mise en œuvre de l'outil de visualisation de tableau de bord d'Apollo
inputs.Résultats: rapports de fin de trimestre livrés 15 % plus rapidement, 95 % de l'équipe financière accédant au tableau de bord dans les 3 mois

Etude de cas.contextual_prompt_user:
Title: Transforming Widget Production Tracking: A Case Study on Acme, Inc.'s Success with Apollo, Inc.

Introduction:

Apollo, Inc., a leading provider of data visualization and analytics solutions, has established a strong partnership with Acme, Inc., a prominent manufacturer of widgets. This collaborative relationship aimed to optimize Acme, Inc.'s operations and address specific challenges in their production process.

The Challenge:

Acme, Inc.'s primary challenge was to effectively track and monitor its widget production. With an extensive range of products and a high volume of daily output, the company struggled to maintain accurate and up-to-date records. This issue had far-reaching implications, hindering Acme, Inc.'s ability to make informed decisions, identify production inefficiencies, and meet customer demands in a timely manner.

The Solution:

To tackle this challenge, Apollo, Inc. proposed a custom dashboard visualization solution that would streamline Acme, Inc.'s widget production tracking. This innovative tool was designed to:

1. Consolidate and display real-time production data in an intuitive and user-friendly interface.
2. Allow Acme, Inc.'s team to easily identify trends, patterns, and potential issues in the production process.
3. Enable quick and informed decision-making by providing accessible and actionable insights.

The Results:

The implementation of Apollo, Inc.'s dashboard visualization solution yielded impressive results for Acme, Inc.:

1. A significant 15% improvement in the speed of delivery of end-of-quarter reports, allowing for more efficient financial planning and analysis.
2. Enhanced visibility into production inefficiencies, leading to a 10% reduction in waste and a subsequent cost savings.
3. Positive feedback from the Acme, Inc. finance team, who praised the solution's ease of use and the valuable insights it provided.
4. Rapid adoption of the solution across various departments, demonstrating its effectiveness and versatility.

Conclusion:

The Acme, Inc. case study highlights the transformative power of Apollo, Inc.'s data visualization solutions in addressing complex business challenges.

4. Call to action: Encourage viewers to adopt an eco-friendly lifestyle and consider implementing the green technologies discussed in the script.

Add striking statistics and facts:

Article de presse à partir d'une dépêche.prompt_user:

Introduction :

Résumez les points clés de la dépêche AFP, en présentant les informations essentielles de l'événement ou du sujet.
Corps de l'Article :

Développez les informations fournies dans la dépêche, en ajoutant des contextes, des citations, et des perspectives supplémentaires.
Intégrez des analyses d'experts ou des commentaires de témoins, si disponibles.
Approfondissement et Perspectives :

Explorez les implications plus larges de l'événement ou du sujet traité.
Reliez l'événement à des tendances ou des enjeux plus globaux, si pertinent.
Conclusion :

Récapitulez les principaux points de l'article.
Si possible, proposez un aperçu des développements futurs ou des actions attendues en lien avec le sujet.
Style et Ton :

Assurez-vous que le ton de l'article est adapté au public de 'Global News Network'.
Le style doit être clair, factuel et objectif, respectant les normes journalistiques.
Résultat Attendu :

Un article de presse complet, informatif et bien documenté, qui enrichit le contenu de la dépêche AFP avec des analyses supplémentaires et des perspectives diverses."
